Entries.give_flowersA: A bouquet!$5#$b#All right. If an old woman like me is good enough for you...$7
Entries.give_flowersB: ...! I accept!$5#$b#I still think I'm too old for you.$2#$b#But I'm sure we'll make it work.$5
Entries.give_pendant: Yes! Of course yes!$h#$b#I'll go talk to Lewis about gettin things set up.$5#$b#Penny'll have to get used to having a new stepdad^Penny'll have to get used to having a new stepmom.$7
Entries.stardrop_gift: 'Hey, hun, can you talk for a second?$6#$b#I wanted to give you this stardrop. Gus helped me pick it out.$5#$b#Really taught me a thing or two about love.$7
Entries.rejectNPCA: What's this for?$4#$b#Look kid, I appreciate the gesture but I'm too old and drunk for ya.#$b#Go find yourself someone closer to your age.$h
Entries.rejectNPCB: Those are not something you can give to me... buzz off kid.$4
Entries.reject_two_heartA: That's sweet, but I don't like you like that.$6
Entries.reject_two_heartB: Aren't we both farmers? How would you suggest we run them both?$h
Entries.reject_four_heartA: Pretty sure you're closer to my daughter's age, kid.$2
Entries.reject_four_heartB: Not lookin for another mistake, kid.$2
Entries.engageA: Aren't you getting married?  You shouldn't be handing this off to just anyone.
Entries.engageB: Marriage is something special... don't mess it up.$4
Entries.marriedA: Don't be messing around behind your spouse's back.$4
Entries.marriedB: Where are you finding these pendants...$2
Entries.refusal_knownA: Kid, save that for someone who'll take care of you right.
Entries.refusal_knownB: Jas and Shane need me here. No, thank you.
Entries.refusal_botherB: No means no! How are you not getting that!?$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Not that I don't appreciate this, but I would feel like I'm robbin' the cradle.$2
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I'm not lookin' to get married, kid.  Go find yourself someone special.
